ABC.caption: Service Account Email
ABC.doc: Enter the email address of the service account.
ABC.name: service_account_email

ABD.caption: Scope
ABD.doc: Enter the desired scope. You may enter a space-delimited list of scopes.
ABD.name: scope

ABE.caption: Email to Impersonate
ABE.doc: Enter an email address to impersonate (usually a super-admin on the domain).
ABE.name: email_to_impersonate

ABF.caption: key
ABF.doc: Enter the entirety of the .PEM key. See the plugin page for support.
ABF.name: key
